insights.populationGrowth: Declining at -0.6% annually due to harsh climate and limited economic opportunities driving outmigration.
insights.educationLevel: Moderate education with 74% literacy. Remote location limits access to higher education.
insights.employmentPattern: Livestock herding 55%, mining 20%, agriculture 15%, government 6%, services 4%. Growing mining sector.
insights.housingPattern: Traditional gers 55%, permanent houses 30%, seasonal shelters 15%. Nomadic lifestyle dominates.

insights.temperature: Extreme continental climate, harsh winters (-35°C), hot summers (32°C). Mountain-steppe transition zone.
insights.precipitation: Low precipitation 180mm, concentrated in summer. Arid conditions with high evaporation rates.
insights.seasonality: Brutal winter (November-March), brief spring (April-May), hot summer (June-August), short autumn.
insights.extremeEvents: Severe dzud events, intense droughts, dust storms, flash flooding in mountainous areas.
